name: Paradise Inc
description:
Everything you want, for just one little soul…

Times were tough. Laid off from yet another job, your rent was long past due and your prospects looked dismal. So when you got an unexpected call from a company you’d never heard of, you jumped at the chance. Your interviewer wasn’t some old man in a suit, though: she was a purple-skinned demoness who promised you a life you could scarcely dream of, if you signed on the dotted line. How could you refuse?

Now, given a new sexy demonic form (of any gender you'd like) you’re in command of Paradise, a massive luxury mall and hotel that appeared all but overnight. You must build new shops, maintain your energy levels, and find those whose inner desires run deep enough that they would be willing to trade their soul for a new life. With a devoted secretary, a new body, and a wealth of possibilities, it’s time to report for your first day of work!

Paradise Inc is a swinging, bisexual adventure into a world of magic and mystery. Find humans with powerful desires, grant them a form that fulfills them, and set them loose on your customers…and each other! Just be careful. It turns out there's a lot more to being a succubus/incubus than just enjoying the perks of the job, including break-ins, kidnappings, magic-gone-wrong... and a hidden agenda that your new boss just happened to fail to mention. Good luck!

  • Text-based choose-your-own-adventure with more than one million words of erotic adventure and romance!
  • Porn with plot: discover the end game and make your choices, succeed or fail, and face the consequences of your actions!
  • 10 transformable characters, each with two distinct erotic transformations.
  • Customize your character - even change your gender!
  • Play as dominant, submissive, or switch to suit your mood.
  • Manage resources and upgrade locations to keep your business in business!
  • Invest in yourself and earn perks to change up your gameplay style.
  • Unlock achievements and Easter eggs as you play
